4th grader Zaid fled his home 3 years ago. He has forgotten the names of his friends back home. We won’t forget Zaid.  Let’s remember the children of Syria. You can help Save the Children. #WithSyria http://bit.ly/1xaPNzc Timeline Photos

Nearly 10 years ago, I met brave Martunis, now 18, who survived the Indian Ocean #tsunami. A news crew found him alone on a beach in Banda Aceh.  I honor those who died, admire the strength of the children who survived and give thanks to everyone who helped.  Save the Children

Photo Credit:  Egan Hwan for Save the Children. Timeline Photos

Great to meet these brave NYC kids after the friendly against Ireland. They survived Superstorm Sandy and stayed strong! With the help of Save the Children these kids are now helping other communities. Timeline Photos

Ahmed, 16, is a Syrian refugee. He dreams of becoming a footballer. Save the Children and I stand with Ahmed and #withSyria whose children deserve a better tomorrow. http://bit.ly/1kAqYKR
Photo: CJ Clarke for @SaveTheChildren. Timeline Photos

All of my support to the people affected by typhoon #Haiyan. Save the Children is helping meet children’s basic needs. Let’s all help. Donate to the Typhoon Haiyan Children's Relief Fund Save the Children is providing disaster relief to children and families devastated by typhoons in the Philippines. Please donate to help support our efforts

Well done to all the kids in Mozambique who ran in Save the Children’s relay marathon last month. Kids helping kids and staying fit by running. That’s a winning combination. Instagram savethechildren's photo on Instagram

I have learned about Stefano Borgonovo from Carlo Ancelotti who was very close to him. Stefano was a great striker and a real fighter - on and off the pitch. Foi um dos momentos mais marcantes da minha vida e um percurso que muito me orgulha pelo que todos juntos, conseguimos. Reafirmo, sem estar preocupado com contratos, que estou unicamente concentrado em vencer todos os jogos e todos os troféus em disputa na imprescindível companhia dos meus companheiros e de todos os madridistas.
Em casa, com amigos ou no estádio....amanhã estamos todos juntos. Força Portugal! Timeline Photos
